mn102:3.1: etaṃ → evaṃ (mr) | paraṃ maraṇā → parammaraṇā (sya-all); maraṇāti (mr) | panekesaṃ → panetesaṃ (sya-all, km)
mn102:7.4: saṅkhārehi, viññāṇassa → aññatra viññāṇā (sya-all, km); aññatra viññāṇassa (pts-vp-pli1ed); aññatra viññāṇena (mr)
mn102:11.3: uddhaṃ saraṃ → uddhaṃsarā (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed); uddhaṃ parāmasanti (sya-all, km)
